data.name: Tic-tac-toe winner
data.description:
Your task is to return the evaluation of the specified tic-tac-toe game area.
 
 See the details: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tic-tac-toe
 
 The game area is provided as 3x3 array with the following values: 'X','0' and undefined(three spaces actually).
 The function should return who is a winner according to the game rules.
 The result can be: 'X','0' or undefined.
 
For example: 
```
   [['X',   ,'0'],
    [   ,'X','0'],       =>  'X'
    [   ,   ,'X']]

   [['0','0','0'],
    [   ,'X',   ],       =>  '0'
    ['X',   ,'X']]

   [['0','X','0'],
    [   ,'X',   ],       =>  undefined
    ['X','0','X']]

   [[   ,   ,   ],
    [   ,   ,   ],       =>  undefined
    [   ,   ,   ]]

```
